title: BONUS CONTENT - Dan Patrick Interviews NBC’s Randy Moss about Saturday’s Breeders Cup
itunes:title: BONUS CONTENT - Dan Patrick Interviews NBC’s Randy Moss about Saturday’s Breeders Cup
description:
In advance of the Breeders' Cup World Championships live from Keeneland Race Course in Lexington, Kentucky, Dan catches up with NBC Horse Racing Analyst Randy Moss to set the stage. With 14 Championship races worth over $31 million in purses and awards, DP & Randy discuss what to look for this weekend at the track.

 

Learn more at BreedersCup.com/2020 and catch all the action live starting this Friday on NBC Sports.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
